Kakashi uses his [[Sharingan]] to copy Guy's Dynamic Entry, and then the two of them perform it together.

== Trivia ==
* This move references the [[w:c:Kamenrider:Rider Kick|Rider Double Kick]] used by [[w:c:Kamenrider:Double Riders|Kamen Riders 1 & 2]].
